entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Feature Requested] Add Auto Change Layout Direction (Rtl , Ltr) By Button Or Change Culture #53292
  • Cannot scaffold Identity due to ambiguous calls between extension methods. #53290
  • [Blazor] `@key` is not respected for interactive WebAssembly components after publish #53289
  • Blazor WebAssembly app keeps re rendering component #53287
  • The ValidateAuthenticationStateAsync in the RevalidatingAuthenticationStateProvider in 8.0.X is never called #53286
  • Cannot get static files like js from razor class library in Production environment #53285
  • [Blazor] Dynamically adjust WebAssembly resource download throttling #53284
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot #53282
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #53281
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #53280
  • Published size regression: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #53279
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json, json #53278
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json #53277
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, mapaction, plainTextEmptyFilter #53276
  • Blazer Server Authentication Issues #53275
  • Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'parentNode') with recursive component #53269
  • Invalid authentication configuration crashes ASP.NET core (stack overflow) #53267
  • Blazor Identity components don't specify `id` for labels #53266
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-alpha.1.24055.6] Some web app pages load failed with js errors #53264
  • HttpContext is not null for the fist time call in OnInitializedAsync() #53263
  • Blazor (Server) route does not match when complex characters are in the url #53262
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, plaintext #53261
  • You must install or update .NET to run this application. #53260
  • IRazorViewEngine render view to html string, javascript tag is stripped out #53259
  • CascadingValueSource<T> should automatically invoke NotifyChangedAsync for INotifyPropertyChanged values #53257

Closed

  • [Blazor] Auto Render not working properly in .NET 8 and page locks until WebAssembly start #52154
    8.0.x
  • Blazor override Parametter in Child component with new #22530
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Consider transpiling Microsoft.JSInterop to ES2018 #40741
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Cannot debug Blazor Wasm application on .Net 6: Unable to attach to browser #41443
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor webassembly Hosting Problem #41604
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Blazor] Breaking big batches into smaller ones #9784
    Backlog
  • [BlazorWasm] Too much is trimmed when not building web host #43283
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Not possible to call JavaScript method #53161
  • .NET 8 Blazor NavigationManager not always initialized when used in AuthorizationHandler #53216
  • Perf improvement: json, mapaction #53202
  • Fluent UI or any other Package Static File 404 Error in ASP.NET Core MVC Project #53230
  • Blazor SSR using Iframe is not working #53258
  • SignalR Firefox tests disabled on Mac #53228
    9.0-preview1
  • Unskip grpc template tests on macos 11 #47336
    Test failures

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Auto render mode improvements #53291
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, ask-mode, 8.0.x
  • Fix closing SignalR Websocket connection on server close #53288
    area-signalr
  • [Blazor] Default to iife instead of cjs for blazor.*.js bundles #53283
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] each navigation to external logs 2 errors a minute later #53271
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Blazor InputRadio is broken by IHandleEvent #53270
    area-blazor, 8.0.x

Merged

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix misdetection of component comments #52744
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.2
  • [Blazor] Auto render mode improvements #53159
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • [FabricBot] Remove usage of 'noActivitySince' operand condition #53256
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] Fix NavigationManager.Refresh() on SSR-only pages #52767
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.2
  • [release/7.0] Disable Yarn in Source Build on 8.0 #53253
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.16
  • [release/8.0] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #53157
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 8.0.2
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #53249
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.27
  • [Blazor] Blazor InputRadio is broken by IHandleEvent #53245
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Unify all our common dev dependencies #53237
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • Improve key service unsupported exception message #53226
    area-signalr, 9.0-preview1
  • Annotate Http.Connections for trimming #52918
    area-signalr, linker-friendliness, 9.0-preview1
  • Only publish npm assets from Windows #53254
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Update karma.local.conf.js #53247
    area-signalr, 9.0-preview1
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #53251
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.2
  • Enable gRPC tests on MacOS 12 #53186
    area-grpc, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Support resolving MethodInfo from strongly-typed route handler delegate #53184
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, feature-rdf
  • [release/7.0] [Blazor] Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props` not getting packed correctly #52972
    area-blazor, ask-mode, 7.0.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #53250
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Added a null check in ResolveHasInvalidAntiforgeryValidationFeature() #53208
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [Blazor] Prevent NPE in ExternalLogin.razor #53222
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Use cached ILogger instances to avoid repeated creation of these instances #53200
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Speed up ILEmitTrie jump table using Binary Search Tree #52928
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-routing
  • [Blazor] Dispatch inbound activity handlers in Blazor Web apps #53185
    area-blazor
